attributes.action: kindly direct his Cabinet colleagues and members of the Parliamentary Labour Party to return all monies claimed as expenses to the taxpayer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the Rt. Hon. Harriet Harman, Leader of the House of Commons, and Deputy Leader of the Labour Party noted, with regard to Sir Fred Goodwin's recently publicised pension details, 'It is money for nothing... The Prime Minister has asked him to forego it and obviously we want him to do that - that's the most straightforward and honourable way to do it.' 

Similarly, we, the undersigned, suggest that, following recent reports of the nature of their expense claims, the most straightforward and honourable action for the Honourable Members of the House of Commons to take would be to return all monies claimed to the taxpayer.
